title: WWE Bottom Line
overview: WWE Bottom Line was 1 of the World Wrestling Federation's now known as the World Wrestling Entertainment many Talk shows. It was hosted by Jonathan "The Coach" Coachman on a regular basis. The Coach would show highlights of some of the best matches of the week and then he and 1 of 2 guest co-hosts would discuss the matches in detail and the ramifications of each one. The 2 guest co-hosts that alternated appearances were Josh Matthews and Terri Runnels. The show was broadcast in the USA on Saturday mornings at 11 AM from 25 May 2002 to September 2005 when it was removed from syndication due to declining ratings.
